SpaceSystem.name: UnitTest-Convert
SpaceSystem.LongDescription: This is a bogus satellite telemetry and telecommand database. The purpose of this file is to unit test the XTCE 1.1 to 1.2 conversion feature.

AuthorSet.Author: David Overeem, Member of the OMG SDTF and XTCE RTF

AbsoluteTimeParameterType.name: POSIXTimeType
AbsoluteTimeParameterType.shortDescription: POSIX UNIX Time 'timeval' which is 2 unsigned 32 bit integers

EnumeratedParameterType.name: MissionType
EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Reserved Mission Phase and Operating Modes

SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSPacket
SequenceContainer.LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telemetry and command packets

SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSTelemetryPacket
SequenceContainer.LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telemetry packets.

SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSPUSTelemetryPacket
SequenceContainer.LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS/ECSS PUS telemetry packets.

CommandContainer.name: CCSDSCommandPacket
CommandContainer.LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS command packets.

MetaCommand.name: CCSDSPUSCommandPacket
MetaCommand.LongDescription: Super-Command for all CCSDS/ECSS PUS command packets.

SpaceSystem.name: SC001
SpaceSystem.shortDescription: This is the first spacecraft in the BogusSAT system

BooleanParameterType.name: Battery_Charge_Mode_Type
BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter indicates whether the charger is charging the battery

FloatParameterType.name: Battery_Voltage_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured battery voltage
FloatParameterType.LongDescription: The battery on BogusSAT is a modeled by a typical flooded lead acid car battery.

FloatParameterType.name: Battery_Current_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured current draw
FloatParameterType.LongDescription: The battery on BogusSAT is a modeled by a typical flooded lead acid car battery.

FloatParameterType.name: Battery_State_Of_Charge_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: Calculated battery state of charge

FloatParameterType.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured solar array output voltage at the charger
FloatParameterType.LongDescription: The solar array on BogusSAT is 10 230W Trina TSM-DA05 monocrystalline panels, wired in series.

FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is an analog parameter with a simple quadratic encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_SingleRoot_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float quadratic encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_SingleRoot2_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float quadratic encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Demo_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Quad_Interpolate_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding and unsupported interpolation

FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Quad_Infinite_Slope_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding and infinite slope - no good

FloatParameterType.name: Float_Missing_PolyTerms_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with no terms in a polynomial calibrator (invalid)

FloatParameterType.name: Float_Missing_SplinePoints_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with no points in a spline calibrator (invalid)

FloatParameterType.name: Float_Order0_PolyTerms_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with an order 0 polynomial calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_Order1_PolyTerms_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with an order 1 polynomial calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_Order3_PolyTerms_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with an order 3 polynomial calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_1_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a simple math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_2_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a longer math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_3_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with no operations in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_4_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with unsupported element in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_5_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with short stack in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_6_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with unsupported operator in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_7_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with lots of operators in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_8_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with lots of operators in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_9_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with lots of operators in math operation calibrator

FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_10_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with arithmetic exception in math operation calibrator

BooleanParameterType.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_State_Type
BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: The operational state of the solar array voltage sensor

Parameter.name: SensorTime
Parameter.shortDescription: Measurement time of the sensor data

Parameter.name: SunSensorMode
Parameter.shortDescription: Operational mode of the sun sensor

Parameter.name: EarthSensorMode
Parameter.shortDescription: Operational mode of the earth sensor

Parameter.name: SunSensorLevel
Parameter.shortDescription: Illumination level measurement of the sun sensor

Parameter.name: EarthSensorLevel
Parameter.shortDescription: Illumination level of the earth sensor

MathAlgorithm.name: ComputeBatterySOC
MathAlgorithm.shortDescription: Compute the battery state of charge

IntegerArgumentType.name: RW_UNIT_ID_Type
IntegerArgumentType.shortDescription: ID number of the reaction wheel

EnumeratedArgumentType.name: RW_PWR_STATE_Type
EnumeratedArgumentType.shortDescription: Flag to indicate if power should be turned on or off

MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_Control
MetaCommand.LongDescription: This hardware telecommand directs the hardware to power on or off either of the 2 reaction wheels

MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_1_On
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power on for reaction wheel 1
MetaCommand.LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns ON reaction wheel 1

MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_1_Off
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power off for reaction wheel 1
MetaCommand.LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns OFF reaction wheel 1

MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_2_On
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power on for reaction wheel 2
MetaCommand.LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns ON reaction wheel 2

MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_2_Off
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power off for reaction wheel 2
MetaCommand.LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns OFF reaction wheel 2

MetaCommand.name: Set_Mission_Phase
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set the bus electronics mission phase

BlockMetaCommand.name: Disable_All_Wheels
BlockMetaCommand.shortDescription: This telecommand is pre-defined to shut down all reaction wheels

SpaceSystem.name: Payload1
SpaceSystem.LongDescription: This is the primary revenue generating payload software monitor and control data.

FloatParameterType.name: Basic_Float32_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float32 parameter with a simple float32 encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Basic_Float64_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float64 parameter with a simple float64 encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Basic_MilFloat16_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float32 parameter with a milstd float16 encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Basic_MilFloat32_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float32 parameter with a milstd float32 encoding

FloatParameterType.name: Basic_MilFloat48_Type
FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float64 parameter with a milstd float48 encoding

IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_signmag_Type
IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with sign magnitude encoding

IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_twoscomp_Type
IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with twos complement encoding

IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_onescomp_Type
IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with ones complement encoding

IntegerArgumentType.name: Value32_Type
IntegerArgumentType.shortDescription: New value to set to 32 bit integer item

MetaCommand.name: Payload_1_Control
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Controls the state of payload operation

Argument.name: OUTPUT_POWER
Argument.LongDescription: Long Description of the output power argument

MetaCommand.name: Adjust_Payload_1_Config
MetaCommand.LongDescription: Modifies an internal configurable item at a provided address for the payload processor
